      • addServer

        public void addServer(java.lang.String nickOne,
             java.lang.String nickTwo,
             java.lang.String nickThree,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.lang.String host,
             java.lang.String port,
             java.lang.String simpleName)
        Adds a server to the database
        Parameters:
        nickOne - Main nickname on the server
        nickTwo - Alternate nickname on the server
        nickThree - Second alternate
        name - Real name (optional)
        host - Hostname of the server
        port - Server port
        simpleName - The servers simple name
